2× faster training for Dragon, Witch and Wall Breaker
3× faster training for Golem, Lava Hound and P.E.K.K.A
1.5× faster training for Balloon, Wizard, Healer, Valkyrie and Bowler
Fixed relation of Haste spell level to Town Hall level

Decreased brewing time of some spells
Fixed Freeze Spell and Spell Factory level accordance

Freeze spell now unlocked on Town Hall level 9 instead of 10
Set P.E.K.K.A to level 5 (instead of 4) when select Town Hall level 10.
Implemented multiline title in the saved compositions
Fix incorrect spells space in the favorites
Fixed training cost of Archer, Dragon and P.E.K.K.A
Added Dark Spells. Thanks to Mikkel Nordskjold for help with icons
Changed training cost of Barbarian, Archer, Dragon and P.E.K.K.A
Returned cost and time for Balloons and Hog Riders
Half the time and half the cost for Balloons and Hog Riders
Added custom color for Android Chrome on Lollipop

The cost of Giants level 1-5 is reduced by 250 Elixir
Due to changes in 11/12 Winter Update, changed order of Goblin and Giant, now Giant comes first
Added Lava Hound and Dark Barracks level 6
Returned cost and training time for Wizard
Temporary reduced cost and training time for Wizard
Now you can select zero level of the first barrack
Optimized distribution of troops between the barracks in rare cases
Fixed a bug related to change of screen orientation on some devices
Fixed a bug with non-working +/- buttons when device supports touch and mouse input at the same time
Fixed share link with quotes at the end
Fixed a bug with the incorrect distribution between the Dark Barracks
Clash Calc was not initialized in rare cases. It’s fixed now
Fixed a message when using Safari in Private Mode
Fixed a rare bug when scrolling stuck in place
Fixed incorrect behavior of the help tooltip in Internet Explorer
Reduced training cost for P.E.K.K.A level 3 and 4
Fixed a bug with the incorrect grand total when “Subtract” column is used
Fixed a bug with the incorrect distribution between the barracks in rare cases
Added hints on controversial moments (click on the question mark icon to see a hint)
Added highlighting of the changed settings when select level of the Town Hall
Removed Setting Mode switcher, it’s always enabled
In the Spell Factory table added row with the grand total cost for troops and spells
Optimized performance and improved usability of +/- buttons
Fixed some rare bugs and improved stability
Fixed a bug related to incorrect setting the level of barracks on some Town Hall levels
Fixed a rare bug related to incorrect production time of spells when Spell Factory level was set to 0
Fixed Hog Rider level 1 training cost (was 39, now 40)
Increased calculator performance (faster loading, better responsiveness)
Animated saving and deleting of saved compositions
Dropped Opera 12.1 and Safari 5.1 support (currently supported browsers is Safari 6+, Chrome 21+, Firefox 24+, IE 10+, Android 4+ and Opera 17+)
When possible, troops distributed between the barracks into equal parts
Improved usability of plus/minus buttons (no more frozen state on desktop or failed attempts to scroll on mobile)
Improved support for non-Apple devices (Android and other mobile devices)
Added support for “gem-boosted” Barracks and Dark Barracks
Fixed a bug with the inability to focus the input field in some cases
Fixed a bug related to preset levels according to the Town Hall level 2
Fixed a bug in Safari 5 and 6 related to setting mode
Added Setting Mode with the possibility of preset levels of buildings, troops and spells according to the level of the Town Hall
Values from the “Subtract” columns not preserved between browser sessions anymore
Zeros no longer used for empty values in the text fields
Added display of the queue length for barracks
Dropped IE 9 support (currently supported browsers is Safari 5.1+, Chrome 21+, Firefox 17+, IE 10+, Android 4+ and Opera 12.1+)
The cost of spells now in Elixir instead of Gold
Fixed a bug associated with the inability to open some shared compositions
“Too many units” message changed to “Exceeded the maximum queue length of the barracks”
Updated home screen icons for iOS 7
Increased default page zoom on iOS
On the big screens shows two tables in a row
If all the barracks of the same level, they are sorted according army creation time
Decreased training time for Wizard, Balloon and Hog Rider
Decreased price for Healing, Rage, Jump and Freeze spells
Added Wizard level 6 and Freeze spell level 4
Also fixed bug when part of the army did not appear in the saved compositions in some cases
Optimized distribution of troops between the barracks, especially for easy filling
Dark Barracks level 5 queue capacity increased to 80
Witch is now displayed in the saved compositions
Troops that not suitable for barracks levels is not displayed in the saved compositions
Added a field with a textual representation of the current composition
“Share Composition” block does not displayed if no troops or spells are selected
Decreased Hog Rider’s housing space from 6 to 5
When loading a saved composition the page scrolls to the Barracks table
Now you can increase or decrease the values in the text fields using the up and down arrow keys on the keyboard
Fixed inability to choose five spells
Display of troops/spells level and Amry Camps/Spell Factory capacity removed from the saved compositions
Comments moved to a separate page, added “Contact Me” section, share buttons removed from the top
Freeze spell, level 6 Lighting and Heal spells
Army Camps maximum capacity increased to 240 troops
Fixed iOS third-party browsers bug (when was shown only a white screen)
Buildings settings moved to the main tables
Army camps capacity is now selected from the list of predefined values
Fixed a bug when repeated composition saved again due to subtract values
Added “Share Composition” feature, now you can quickly and easily share your army composition with friends
The word “calculation” as the name for the combination of the army, spells and buildings replaced by the word “composition”
Repeated composition now are not saved when you press “Save Composition”
Fixed iOS Home Screen shortcut bug (when was shown only a white screen)
Created Twitter account to post updates and other useful information
Added share buttons and Twitter follow link
Some text info from the top is placed above the comments section
Added total cost with subtracted troops
Once again, optimized distribution of troops between the barracks, especially when the difference between the levels of the barracks is significant
Added copyright warning to the description of the page
Optimized distribution of troops between the barracks when the maximum troop level less than the minimum barrack level
Healer training time decreased from 20 to 15 minutes, housing space requirement decreased from 20 to 14 and training cost decreased for all levels
Fixed several bugs regarding the distribution of troops between barracks
What’s New block and Version History box
Fixed a bug on iPhone/iPad when many troops cause lags
Bigger buttons to simplify tapping on iPhone/iPad (and other minor improvements: reduced indents, reduced font size of the headers, width set to fit the content)
Fixed a bug when all troops goes to a single barrack
Grouping troops of the same type in distribution between the barracks (as much as possible)
Improved distribution between the barracks to reduce the time of production
The maximum value of Army Camps Capacity limited to 220
Dramatically increased performance, especially on iPhone/iPad
Removed background highlighting on table rows
Fixed a bug in which a long press on the plus/minus led to the selection of the text
Reduced internal indent in the tables
Subtract values does not saved with “Save Calculation” feature anymore
Font for iOS changed to Arial
Dark Barracks max level increased to 4
Production time for spells decreased: Lighting/Healing — 30m, Rage/Jump — 45m

Added awesome feature to “subtract” troops, which you already have. For example, you want to get 100 Barbarians and 100 Archers. And you already have 20 Barbarians. In the column “Quantity”, as usual, make 100 Barbarians and 100 Archers. And in the column “Subtract” 20 Barbarians. Now the distribution between the barracks are considered to be only for 80 Barbarians and 100 Archers. This is very useful, when after the battle you have remained part of the army
The correct order for keyboard navigation through <kbd>TAB</kbd> key
Production time for each troop separately are no longer displayed (useless information)
Added lovely icon for iOS “Add to Home Screen” feature
New favicon for easy identification of the site among many open tabs
Removed embedded font, font changed to PT Sans/Helvetica Neue/Arial, it greatly reduced the speed of page loading
Army camps capacity increment/decrement in five points
Wall Breaker capacity increased from 1 to 2
P.E.K.K.A training time reduced from 1 hour to 45 minutes
Fixed a bug in which the troops were distributed in barracks without accounting maximum barracks queue
Fixed bug with negative number of troops
Added distribution of troops between barracks for optimal training speed
The previous values of the maximum level and number of barracks, unfortunately, have not saved

Default values changed to maximum allowed in game
Added auto-select of text in fields for simplify edit in iOS

The title is replaced by the more similar to the contents of the page
